articles.title: Appeals court throws out massive civil fraud penalty against President Donald Trump
articles.description: An appeals court has overturned a significant civil fraud penalty against former President Donald Trump, a major victory for the former president.

articles.title: UN declares famine in Gaza; 2 people starve to death in 24 hours
articles.description: A UN classification system has officially declared famine in Gaza, with over half a million Palestinians facing catastrophic conditions. Israel's Foreign Ministry has rejected the findings.

articles.title: FBI searches home of former Trump national security adviser John Bolton
articles.description: The FBI has searched the home of former Trump national security adviser John Bolton, focusing on whether he illegally possessed or shared classified information.
